argument.name: scope
argument.description: The scope of the spell check operation. Valid values include:

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.SPELL_CHECK() method displays the object specified by <OBJECT> and the Spellchecker dialog box. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: The follow example displays the Spellchecker dialog box.

section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Customer Information") ptr.Spell_Check("record")
